Get In Touch

INCOTERMS

The Incoterms or International Commercial Terms are a series of pre-defined commercial terms published by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC) relating to international commercial law.

TRAILER TYPES

This will assist you on how to determine the quality and types of trailers that you need to carry and transport your load or freight

WAGON TYPES

This is a list of all types of vehicle that can be used on a railway, either specifically for running on the rails, or for maintenance or up-keep of a railway

CONTAINER TYPES

Containers have been customized to meet the demands of exporters and importers in international trade. Get dimensions and capacity of standard shipping containers for your cargo transportation .

INTERNATIONAL TERMS

The transportation industry has a unique vocabulary. The global logistics management team must be familiar with these freight terms.

CMR

An international agreement that contains the rights and obligations of parties involved in road transport. “Contrat de Transport International de Marchandises par Route“

AETR

The European Agreement Concerning the Work of Crews of Vehicles Engaged in International Road Transport (AETR) rules are now the same as the EU rules on drivers’ hours.

ATP

agreement on the international carriage of perishable foodstuffs and on the special equipment to be used for such carriage (atp)

CCC 1976

customs convention on containers, 1972. the contracting parties, desiring to develop and facilitate international carriage by container, have agreed as follows

UNECE

Un Transport Agreements and Conventions , general agreement on economic regulations for international road transport, of 17 march 1954

ABOUT PORTGATE

Since 1999 PORTGATE carries out all kinds of international cargo transportation mainly in the Caucasus region, Central Asia and the CIS countries. The majority of the transportations are completed through the TRACECA corridor.
